title: Kodiyile Malligapoo Song Lyrics Kadalora Kavithaigal
stanzas:
kodiyile malligai poo
manakkudhe maane
edukkavaa thodukkavaa
thudikkiren naane.

parikka solli thoonduthe
pavala malli thottam
nerunga vida villaiye
nenjukulle koocham

kodiyile malligai poo
manakkudhe maane
kodukkavaa thadukkavaa
thavikkiren naane.

Manasu thadumaarum
adhu nenacha neram maarum
mayakkam irundhaalum
oru thayakkam thada podum

nitham nitham un nenappu
nenjukuli kaayum
maadu rendu paadha rendu
vandi engae serum

pothi vachaa anbu illa
solliputtaa vambu illa
sollathaane thembu illa
indha thunban yaaraala

parakkum dhesai yedhu
idha parava ariyaadhu
uravo theriyaadhu
adhu unakkum puriyaadhu

paaraiyile poo molachi
paappavaga yaaru
anbu konda nenjathukku
aayushu nooru.

kaalam varum velaiyila
kathiruppen pon mayile
thaeva varum unmaiyile
seidhi solven kannaale

kodiyile malligai poo
manakkudhe maane
kodukkavaa thadukkavaa
thavikkiren naane.

parikka solli thoonduthe
pavala malli thottam
nerunga vida villaiye
nenjukulle koocham

kodiyile malligai poo
manakkudhe maane
edukkavaa thodukkavaa
thudikkiren naane.
